description: Give this simple chilli con carne recipe a taste. If you like spice, add more smaller-sized chillies, or you can turn the heat down by using larger chillies.
keywords: Chilli,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Mince,Peanut free
name: Chilli Con Carne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup fresh coriander, chopped (plus leaves to garnish)
410g can salt-reduced red kidney beans, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add onion, chilli and garlic and cook for 5 minutes, stirring often until softened. Transfer to a bowl. Increase heat to medium-high. Add mince and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon to break up lumps, until well browned.
Stir in spices and tomato paste. Cook for 2 minutes. Add tomatoes, stock and beans, stirring to combine. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 20 minutes until thickened.
Stir through coriander. Serve chilli con carne with rice and topped with a dollop of sour cream. Garnish with extra coriander leaves.
